base_description: Rectangular, white cabinet with drawers and doors.
part_description: Three drawers on top, four doors below; rectangular shape with handles.
internal_interaction_description: Drawers slide horizontally within the top section, while doors swing open vertically on hinges. The drawers and doors are equipped with handles for easy access. Each compartment is likely divided internally to provide organized storage space.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet interacts with users by providing storage space. Users can open drawers and doors to access stored items. The flat top surface may hold additional objects, while the cabinet itself can be placed in various room settings.
